text: (napiye!) Avarkalin purakkanippu umakku perun kastamaka iruntal, um'mal mutiyumanal pumiyil curankam vaittu allatu vanattile or eni vaittu (ericcenru avarkal viruppappati) or attatciyai avarkalitam kontuvarum; (appolutum avarkal um'mai nirakarittuk kontu tanirupparkal.) Anriyum allah natinal avarkal anaivaraiyum ner valiyil onru certtu vituvan; akave arivillatavarkalil oruvaraka nir akivitaventam
